comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Original Agence Meurisse photo at Gallica site (Meurisse No. at right of Bain photo), publ. 1914, with caption: Senlis : la rue de la République bombardée par les Allemands Rue de la République bombed by the Germans ] gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b9041805j

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: artolog:  Thank you for finding the matching image on the Gallica site.  We will add the Agence Meurisse caption when we update the image description.
